RabbitsFoot.NAME: Rabbit's Foot
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you would receive 6 or more unblocked attacked damage, reduce the damage received by 1.

Homunculus.NAME: Homunculus
DESCRIPTIONS: HP loss from cards is reduced to 0.

BerserkerAxe.NAME: Berserker Axe
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you take damage from an enemy, gain 1 Strength until the end of your next turn.
